Title: Extends the statute of limitations for coroners, coroners' physicians and medical examiners for article 78 proceedings
Summary: Extends the statute of limitations for coroners, coroners' physicians and medical examiners for article 78 proceedings to ten years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to extending the statute of limitations for coroners, coroners' physicians or medical examiners for article 78 proceedings
